data.title: Bratislava City Museum (Bratislava)
data.meta_description: Bratislava City Museum is a museum in Bratislava. View visitor information, information about the collection and read reviews.
data.text:
The Bratislava City Museum (MÃºzeum mesta Bratislavy, MMB) is a museum in Bratislava. The museum was founded in 1868 and is the oldest surviving museum in Slovakia. The Bratislava City Museum documents the history of the capital from prehistoric times to the 20th century. The main exhibition is located in the Old Town Hall in the Old Town, but there are 7 other affiliated locations. This main location of the Bratislava City Museum is the Museum of the City History, which displays archaeological discoveries and findings and documents a history of pharmacy, culture, social life and numismatics.
